name: How can I prevent participants from printing a questionnaire page or downloading images?
title: How can I prevent participants from printing a questionnaire page or downloading images?
body:
Overview

This article explains how to prevent participants from printing a questionnaire page or downloading images in a survey project. It covers the steps to disable the context menu and discusses additional considerations for content protection.

Information

Learn how to protect your survey content by disabling printing and image downloading capabilities for participants.

  • Disabling Context Menu
  • Additional Considerations

Disabling Context Menu

To prevent participants from printing a questionnaire page or downloading images, you can disable the context menu for the entire questionnaire. Here's how to do it:

Step 1: Access Project Properties

Navigate to Projects → Survey menu → Project properties

Step 2: Locate the Setting

Look for the option to disable the context menu. This setting is primarily used to protect content by deactivating the context menu throughout the entire questionnaire.

Additional Considerations

When using this feature to protect your survey content, keep the following points in mind:

  • Keyboard commands will not be suppressed by this setting.
  • For page-specific protection, you can use a question of the type "Text and image" to achieve similar behavior on a particular questionnaire page.
  • This feature can also be used to prevent the usage of the browser's Back button. To do this, the survey must be opened in a pop-up window without a menu bar.

FAQ

Can participants still use keyboard shortcuts to print or save images?

Yes, keyboard commands are not suppressed by this setting. Additional measures may be needed to prevent keyboard-based actions.

Is it possible to disable printing for only specific pages of the questionnaire?

Yes, you can use a question of the type "Text and image" to implement similar protection for a particular questionnaire page.

How can I prevent participants from using the browser's Back button?

To prevent the use of the browser's Back button, open the survey in a pop-up window without a menu bar and use the context menu disabling feature.
